summary: The diff implements comprehensive UI enhancements with smooth animations, modern design updates, and micro-interactions across all sections. All seven requirements (REQ-10 through REQ-16) are addressed with page transitions, interactive element animations, staggered list animations, modal animations, loading states, typography improvements, and animated empty states. However, explicit prefers-reduced-motion media query handling is not evident in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Animations must respect user's prefers-reduced-motion accessibility preference
missing_requirements.reason: While REQ-11 AC states 'Animations respect user's prefers-reduced-motion setting', the diff does not show explicit @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) CSS rules or JavaScript checks to disable/reduce animations for users with this preference.
